full_text: This is terrifying and very sad - every single Ramadan without ramifications. https://t.co/WDDelBgB34
Her casual accent switches are just mind-blowing. https://t.co/S6dBVkMxbr

Its heartwarming to see so many non-muslims fasting this ramadan, our first in three years with normality. 

I know for many of them there isn't the compulsion to do it nor the spiritual connection but to experience and create a relative culture of understanding is brilliant!

American Hero. Immigration rocks.
